comment.author: 9122478@N03
comment._content: The Crystal Palace building was 1,851 feet (564 m) long, with an interior height of 108 feet (33 m).  It had an exhibition space of over 990,000 square feet (92,000 m2).  It contained over 13,000 exhibits from places such as Britain, New Zealand, Denmark, India, Switzerland and France.
